bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Thursday, August 5, 2010, through Saturday, August 14, 2010, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Monday, September 13, 2010.
